Section.Catchline: Maintenance of information concerning administrative complaints and disciplinary actions.

SectionBody.Text: The department shall maintain statistics and relevant information, by profession, for private investigators, recovery agents, and private security officers which details:

Subsection.Text: The number of complaints received and investigated.
The number of complaints initiated and investigated by the department.
The number of administrative complaints filed by the department.
The disposition of all administrative complaints.
A description of all disciplinary actions taken by profession.
